name: theHunter Classic
summary: he most realistic hunting experience awaits. Explore 11 reserves and hunt 39 unique species, ranging from waterfowl to big game. Over 80 weapons from state-of-the art rifles to bows. Customize your load-out with stands, blinds and dogs. Play alone or in multiplayer with up to 7 friends.
info:
• 中文名: 猎人:经典版
  • 开发: Avalanche Studios
  • 发行: Avalanche Studios
  • 平台: pc
  • 游戏类型: 狩猎 模拟 射击
  • 发行日期: 2014年6月3日
  • 售价: 免费
